Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about the report viewer controls are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">ReportDocument</font> class exists in <font face="courier new">CrystalDecisions.CrystalReports.Engine</font> namespace.
The <font face="courier new">CrystalReportViewer</font> control supports the <font face="courier new">Errors</font> event to track exceptions.
A crystal report supports the .doc format for exporting the report.
The <font face="courier new">CrystalReportViewer</font> class provides the <font face="courier new">Export()</font> method to export a crystal report.
The <font face="courier new">ViewCount</font> property of <font face="courier new">CrystalReportViewer</font> class gets the number of views for the viewer control.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
